transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Kya aap Bharat Engineering Works se baat kar rahe hain Mr. sir?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ha ji bolye sir.
Executive: Sir ye IndiaMART se baat kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Kaise hain aap?
Executive: Badhiya.
Executive: Sir ek concern raise hua tha aapki company ka.
Executive: Ki jo review rating aap le rahe hain na sir, matlab to usme thoda sa issue aa raha hai sir, wo genuinely feedback wo customer ke end se nahi aa raha hai sir.
Executive: Matlab sir? To aap, aap jo ye review rating le rahe hain wo khud se aap create kar rahe hain sir, review rating?
Customer: Kispe sir?
Executive: Mai ye puch raha hu ki jo aap review and rating apne profile pe dal rahe hain, wo kis tarike se aap dal rahe hain sir?
Customer: Rating?
Customer: Jo rating aati hai mere paas.
Executive: Haan, mai keh raha hu ki jo review and ratings hote hain na, jo review and rating ka option hai ek sir.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: To wo aap kis tarike se aap le rahe hain sir, mai bas wo jaana chahta tha aapse.
Customer: Customer de raha hai sir rating to.
Executive: Sir waha pe ye hamare paas jo aa raha hai na information.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To wo jo rating jo ho rahi hai, to wo matlab proper tarike se buyer ke sath nahi mil rahi hai sir, isliye hamare paas ek concern raise hua is cheez ka.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Haan ji. Kyunki jo ratings hoti hai na sir, wo matlab.
Customer: Rating to sir ek baat to bataiye khud bhi dal sakte hain kya rating?
Executive: Nahi, khud se nahi jaise kisi ko matlab ki bol ke, kyunki jo system se generate hote hain automatically jata hai sir ye ratings na.
Customer: Ye to sir customer ne de rakha hai mere ko jinke paas maal pahucha hua hai already.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Ji hamare kya naam hai jo hamari department hai, jo hamari team hai, unhone analyse karke bheja hai hamare ko. To isliye maine aapko ek screenshot bhi bheja tha ki automatic system in place to identify non-genuine rating ki wajah se hamare paas ek concern raise hua tha sir, wo koi baat nahi hai.
Executive: Ab isse kya hoga sir? Kyunki yaha pe bhi yaha pe dekhoge na jo maine aapko screenshot bheja hai waha pe likha hai ki kuch cheeze aisi hai jo suspicious activity ke ke andar aa rahi hai sir.
Executive: To wo jo rating hai wo automatically disable ho jati hai sir. To jo bhi rating hai na sir, jo bhi aapke paas buyer ka jaata hai feedback, theek hai wahi se aap rating prapt kijiye sir.
Customer: Sir wahi se hi aa rahi hai, mai to bolta bhi nahi kisi ko khud hi de rakha hai rating to.
Executive: Achha. Nahi yaha pe kuch cases aaye the isliye ek baar aapse connect karne ke liye bola gaya tha ki ek baar connect karke ek baar information provide kijiye. To isliye maine aapko call kiya tha aur koi reason nahi hai sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Baki aapko koi concern IndiaMART sir ko leke kisi cheez ko leke sir, apne account manager ko leke?
Customer: Koi dikkat nahi sir. Service wagera theek chalti hai koi issue to nahi hai sir services ko leke?
Customer: Nahi. Inquiry calls, buyleads ke.
Customer: Sab theek chal rahi hai.
Executive: Sab theek chal rahi hai? Chaliye. Theek hai sir, mai aapka ye jo concern hamara jo raise hua tha na, ek baar mai aapko ek baar isko close kar deta hu. Jo bhi ratings wagera hai sir, wo aap ek baar buyer se hi le liya kijiye jo bhi rating aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ji bhaiya buyer hi to deta hai mere kaun se 10 accounts chal rahe hain iske upar IndiaMART mein.
Executive: Sir kuch activities hui hai isi wajah se matlab concern raise hua hai internal hamare paas. Isliye maine aapko call kiya tha sir.
Customer: Pehli baar dekha hai sir nahi to ab tak hua nahi kabhi.
Executive: Sir tabhi aapko screenshot abhi aapko maine bheja tha number pe sir. Aur shayad aapke account manager ne bhi aapko bheja hoga screenshot sir.
Customer: Koi nahi sir aapke ab mai customer ko bol dunga bhaiya mere ko rating mat dena aur kya karna hai. Nahi rating to lena, matlab rating to lena, rating wali koi baat nahi hai.
Customer: Ji. Sir forcefully jo bhi hoga hamare paas hai. Hain? Rating leke issue aa raha hai.
Customer: Aage kya ho raha hai?
Executive: Nahi rating ka issue nahi hai na, kuch suspicious hua hai iski wajah se concern raise hua hai sir.
Customer: Ab sir mere ko kaise pata chalega maan lijiye kisi ne mere ko review dal diya.
Executive: Nahi to koi bhi dalta hai usse koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Are. Kuch hua hoga sir backend ki team ne tabhi bheja hai. Aise base pe nahi hai sir. Kuch hua hoga to uski wajah se dal raha hai. Rating lene mein koi problem nahi hai sir.
Customer: To sir mere ko to khud hi matlab IndiaMART pe mere pehle jo account manager the.
Executive: Haan. Unhone khud se mere ko bol rakha tha ki bhaiya rating leke rakha karo. Ha to achi baat hai rating lo. profile apni high level pe pahunchti hai sir. Haan achi baat hai rating lo lekin kuch suspicious hua hoga aapke end pe isliye hamare paas concern raise hua hai sir. Kuch parameters hum uske andar aa rahe hain. Mere ko batana sir kya mere ko batana kaise hua hai kya hua hai fir mai aage se dhyan rakhunga.
Executive: Haan bas ye hai ki kisi matlab jo bhi aap inquiry aati hai usse hi bhejo aap bas, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, okay, okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Review ratings may not be genuine.

- Ratings not matching with buyer feedback.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the concern about ratings.

- Advised to get ratings directly from buyers.



Next Steps: 

- Issue resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- ratings, feedback, buyers, concern, indiaMART
